web3.version.api.description: The ethereum js api version - returns string

web3.version.network.description: The network protocol version - returns string

web3.version.ethereum.description: The ethereum protocol version - returns string

web3.version.whisper.description: The whisper protocol version - returns string

web3.isConnected.description: Check if a connection to a node exists - returns boolean

web3.setProvider.description: Should be called to set provider - returns undefined

web3.currentProvider.description: Will contain the current provider, if one is set. This can be used to check if mist etc. has set already a provider - returns object

web3.reset.description: Should be called to reset state of web3. Resets everything except manager. Uninstalls all filters. Stops polling - returns undefined

web3.toHex.description: Converts any value into HEX - returns string

web3.toAscii.description: Converts a HEX string into a ASCII string - returns string

web3.fromAscii.description: Converts any ASCII string to a HEX string - returns string

web3.toDecimal.description: Converts a HEX string to its number representation - returns string

web3.fromDecimal.description: Converts a number or number string to its HEX representation - returns string

web3.fromWei.description: Converts a number of wei into the following ethereum units - returns string|BigNumber

web3.toWei.description: Converts an ethereum unit into wei - returns string|BigNumber

web3.toBigNumber.description: Converts a given number into a BigNumber instance - returns BigNumber

web3.isAddress.description: Checks if the given string is an address - returns boolean

web3.net.listening.description: This property is read only and says whether the node is actively listening for network connections or not - returns boolean

web3.net.getListening.description: This property is read only and says whether the node is actively listening for network connections or not

web3.net.peerCount.description: This property is read only and returns the number of connected peers - returns boolean

web3.net.getPeerCount.description: This property is read only and returns the number of connected peers

web3.eth.defaultAccount.description: Get default address - return string, 20 bytes. Default is undefined

web3.eth.defaultBlock.description: Get default address - return string|number. Default is 'latest'

web3.eth.syncing.description: This property is read only and returns the either a sync object, when the node is syncing or false

web3.eth.getSyncing.description: This property is read only and returns the either a sync object, when the node is syncing or false

web3.eth.isSyncing.description: This convenience function calls the callback everytime a sync starts, updates and stops

web3.eth.coinbase.description: This property is read only and returns the coinbase address where the mining rewards go to, returns string

web3.eth.getCoinbase.description: This property is read only and returns the coinbase address where the mining rewards go to

web3.eth.mining.description: This property is read only and says whether the node is mining or not - returns boolean

web3.eth.getMining.description: This property is read only and says whether the node is mining or not

web3.eth.hashrate.description: This property is read only and returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with - returns number

web3.eth.getHashrate.description: This property is read only and returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with

web3.eth.gasPrice.description: This property is read only and returns the current gas price. The gas price is determined by the x latest blocks median gas price - return BigNumber

web3.eth.getGasPrice.description: This property is read only and returns the current gas price. The gas price is determined by the x latest blocks median gas price

web3.eth.accounts.description: This property is read only and returns a list of accounts the node controls - returns array

web3.eth.getAccounts.description: This property is read only and returns a list of accounts the node controls

web3.eth.blockNumber.description: This property is read only and returns the current block number - returns number

web3.eth.getBlockNumber.description: This property is read only and returns the current block number

web3.eth.getBalance.description: Get the balance of an address at a given block - returns BigNumber

web3.eth.getStorageAt.description: Get the storage at a specific position of an address - returns string

web3.eth.getCode.description: Get the code at a specific address - returns string

web3.eth.getBlock.description: Returns a block matching the block number or block hash - returns object

web3.eth.getBlockTransactionCount.description: Returns the number of transaction in a given block - returns number

web3.eth.getUncle.description: Returns a blocks uncle by a given uncle index position - returns object

web3.eth.getTransaction.description: Returns a transaction matching the given transaction hash - returns object

web3.eth.getTransactionFromBlock.description: Returns a transaction based on a block hash or number and the transactions index position - returns object

web3.eth.getTransactionReceipt.description: Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash - return object

web3.eth.getTransactionCount.description: Get the numbers of transactions sent from this address - returns number

web3.eth.sendTransaction.description: Sends a transaction to the network - returns string

web3.eth.sendRawTransaction.description: Sends an already signed transaction - return string

web3.eth.sign.description: Signs data from a specific account. This account needs to be unlocked - returns string

web3.eth.call.description: Executes a message call transaction, which is directly executed in the VM of the node, but never mined into the blockchain - returns string

web3.eth.estimateGas.description: Executes a message call or transaction, which is directly executed in the VM of the node, but never mined into the blockchain and returns the amount of the gas used - return number

web3.eth.filter.description: To watch for changes - returns object

web3.eth.contract.description: Creates a contract object for a solidity contract, which can be used to initiate contracts on an address

web3.eth.getCompilers.description: Gets a list of available compilers - returns array

web3.db.putString.description: Store a string in the local leveldb database - returns boolean

web3.db.getString.description: Get string from the local leveldb database - returns string

web3.db.putHex.description: Store binary data in HEX form in the local leveldb database - returns boolean

web3.db.getHex.description: Get a binary data in HEX form from the local leveldb database - returns string

web3.shh.post.description: Post whisper message to the network - returns boolean

web3.shh.hasIdentity.description: Check if user has given identity - returns boolean

web3.shh.filter.description: Watch for incoming whisper messages - return object

web3.eth.sendIBANTransaction.description: Sends IBAN transaction from user account to destination IBAN address
